Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2011 10:40AM WeeSee wrote: Hello Nil. i just came across your post and it broke my heart:(. I havn't been diagnosed with cancer but i have been having alot of breast pain and alot of breast changes for the past couple of months and am so terrified that i have some sort of BC. I'm still awaitng my mammogam, so we'll see. I'm 33 years old and have a a 3 year old little boy who is my world. I really hope that you have someone or something whom is your light in this life.. You have definately come to the right place for support i can tell you that! These women on these boards are truely a bunch of Angels and we are all hugging you right now:). I found support here when it was nowhere else to be found.. You can pour your heart out here and it will really be understood. If nothing else, i hope we can be your light sweetheart. You are definately going to be in my prayers from now on Nil. I hope this post finds you better than your last post and that your phycical pain and the pain in your heart subsides and leaves you with peace, strength, and happiness... God Bless You Sweet Nil! xoxoxo(((hugs))) WeeSee

Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2011 11:51PM WeeSee wrote: Tigger, i know you must be scared out of your wits but carpediem is sooo right.. IT IS WHAT IT IS! Whatever is going to be will be.. I just really hope it turns out to be nothing. I can tell you that i've been having discharge when i squeeze my nipple too. Like a greenish, yellowish, clear, and it's very oily. All the docs and np i've seen so far say, that there not worried about it because it's not coming out spuratically. But then again i havn't been getting the greatest care and am still trying to. I do hope that's not the case for you Tigger. Pejkug, it's really scarry to me that the discharge was your only symptom before you were diagnosed with IDC and it's only one of my symptoms of a few, and they tell me that they are not conserned. I wish i could be blessed with the type of docs that you ladies have been blessed with. Good luck tomarrow Tigger.. I wish you nothing but the best news wich is no bad news at all! Try and get some sleep darlin. WeeSee
